Merge branch 'issue4476' of https://github.com/shiveshr/pravega-1 into issue4476

timeline.bodyText: You need to add a check inside truncate to verify if isRunning() == true. Otherwise we can stop this service, but since this still has a 10-second delay, it will execute one call of truncate and then cancel it. This may not be the intended behavior.
timeline.author: andreipaduroiu

replies.bodyText:
Added a Precondition on truncate method.
Although its not really going to cause any incorrect behaviour even if an extra truncation ran (and would run until the executor is shutdown or curator is shutdown), as it is equivalent to us being in the middle of truncation when the service shutdown.
replies.author: shiveshr

timeline.bodyText: Why don't you inherit from ThreadPoolTestBase which will manage the executor for you?
timeline.author: andreipaduroiu
